description: Enemies that touch Isaac are transformed into Poop.

name: Death's Touch
description: +1.5 damage, -0.3 tears. Tears are replaced with large piercing scythes.

name: Key Piece 1
description: Combined with Key Piece 2, unlocks the golden gate in the starting room of Chest and Dark Room to fight Mega Satan.

name: Key Piece 2
description: Combined with Key Piece 1, unlocks the golden gate in the starting room of Chest and Dark Room to fight Mega Satan.

name: Experimental Treatment
description: Randomly increases and decreases some of Isaac's stats. Increases four random stats and decreases the other two.

name: Contract From Below
description: Doubles the number of most room clear awards, but reduces the overall chance of getting one by 1/3.

name: Infamy
description: Gives Isaac a 50% chance to block projectiles coming from any direction.

name: Trinity Shield
description: Isaac gains a shield that protects him from enemy shots. It aims in the direction Isaac fires from.

name: Tech.5
description: Isaac occasionally fires an unlimited range piercing laser alongside his normal tears. The laser can glitch, mimicking the effects of certain items and trinkets.
Isaac fires two tears at once, one from each eye.  0.8x damage multiplier.

name: Blue Map
description: Reveals the locations of Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms on the map.

name: BFFS!
description: Increases the size and effectiveness of most familiars.

name: Hive Mind
description: Increases the size of Blue Spiders and Blue Flies and doubles the amount of damage they deal.  Also increases the effectiveness of fly and spider familiars.

name: There's Options
description: Two items appear after defeating a Boss. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.

name: BOGO Bombs
description: All normal Bombs become Double Bombs.

name: Starter Deck
description: Isaac can hold 2 cards at once and all pills are replaced by cards.

name: Little Baggy
description: Isaac can hold 2 pills at once and all cards and runes are replaced by pills.

name: Magic Scab
description: Grants one full Red Heart container, +1 luck.  Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

name: Blood Clot
description: Tears fired from the left eye have +1 flat damage, +5 range, and +0.5 tear falling speed.Tears fired from the left eye have +1 flat damage and +2.75 range.

name: Screw
description: +0.5 tears, +0.2 shot speed.

name: Hot Bombs
description: +5 Bombs. Isaac's bombs leave behind fire that damages enemies upon contact.

name: Fire Mind
description: Grants flaming tears that deal burning damage over time. Tears have a chance to explode on impact with an enemy, which creates a fire at the location of the explosion.

name: Missing No.
description: Randomizes all passive items and stats upon pickup and at the start of each succeeding floor.

name: Dark Matter
description: +1 damage, adds a chance to shoot fear tears.

name: Black Candle
description: Prevents curses. Grants one Black Heart. Increases the chance for a Devil Room or Angel Room to appear.

name: Proptosis
description: Tears start out massive with high damage, and then shrink down and become weaker over a short range.

name: Missing Page 2
description: Grants one Black Heart. Upon taking damage that reduces Isaac's health to one heart or less, deals damage to all enemies in the room.  Increases the damage of Black Hearts and The Necronomicon-like effects by 40.

name: Clear Rune
description: Has the same effect as the rune or soul stone currently held by Isaac. The charge time is based on the power of the rune.

name: Smart Fly
description: Spawns an orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots. Upon taking damage, the familiar will pursue enemies for the rest of the room, dealing 22.5 damage per second.

name: Dry Baby
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and blocks enemy projectiles. Upon blocking a shot, it has a chance of triggering The Necronomicon effect.

name: Juicy Sack
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and drips a trail of slow creep, spawning 1-2 Blue Spiders after each room.

name: Robo-Baby 2.0
description: Spawns a familiar that fires lasers at any enemy in its line of sight and moves based on the direction Isaac is firing tears.

name: Rotten Baby
description: Spawns a familiar that spawns a Blue Fly when Isaac shoots. It can only have one Fly at a time.

name: Headless Baby
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac, leaving blood creep on the ground.

name: Leech
description: Spawns a leech familiar that chases enemies, dealing ~3 damage per second. Heals a Half Red Heart whenever Leech kills an enemy.

name: Mystery Sack
description: Spawns a familiar that drops a Heart, coin, Bomb, or Key every 5-6 rooms.

name: BBF
description: Spawns a familiar that flies around the room in a zig-zag pattern and explodes on contact with an enemy. Respawns after ten seconds.

name: Bob's Brain
description: Spawns a familiar that charges forward when shooting tears and explodes upon contact with an enemy, damaging and poisoning them. The familiar respawns after a few seconds.

name: Best Bud
description: When hit, spawns a quickly orbiting attack fly similar to Forever alone for the current room that deals high damage.

name: Lil Brimstone
description: Grants a familiar that charges a thin Brimstone laser while Isaac is shooting.

name: Isaac's Heart
description: Isaac himself is now immune to all damage, and a heart familiar follows him. If the heart is hurt, Isaac is hurt.  The heart charges up as Isaac shoots, firing 8 blood shots, knocking back enemies, and leaving a puddle of creep when released.

name: Lil Haunt
description: Spawns a familiar that chases down enemies, dealing 4 damage per second and inflicting fear.

name: Dark Bum
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and collects Red Hearts. For every 1 Red Hearts collected, Dark Bum will give a reward.

name: Big Fan
description: Spawns a large orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots and deals 30 damage per second to enemies.

name: Sissy Longlegs
description: Spawns a familiar that wanders randomly, occasionally spawning Blue Spiders.  Briefly charms enemies on contact.

name: Punching Bag
description: Spawns a Mulligan familiar that wanders randomly. Enemies will attack the Mulligan if it's closer.

name: How to Jump
description: Upon use, Isaac jumps in the direction he is currently moving, allowing travel over obstacles and enemies.

name: D100
description: Combines the effects of D4, The D6, and D20. Combines the effects of D1, D4, The D6, D7, D8, D10, D12, and D20.

name: D4
description: Rerolls all of Isaac's passive items.

name: D10
description: Re-rolls all monsters in the room. Replaces all monsters in the room with weaker monsters.

name: Blank Card
description: Copies the effect of the card or rune currently held by Isaac. Copies the effect of the card currently held by Isaac. The charge time is based on the power of the card.

name: Book of Secrets
description: Gives the effect of Treasure Map, The Compass, or Blue Map for the duration of the current floor.  If all effects are active, X-Ray Vision is provided for the floor instead. Highlights any Tinted Rocks and rocks with Crawl Space in the room.

name: Box of Spiders
description: Spawns 1-4 Blue Spiders that deal 2.5x Isaac's damage to enemies. Spawns 4-8 Blue Spiders that deal 2x Isaac's damage to enemies.

name: Red Candle
description: Throws out a flame that damages everything in its path, diminishing in size as it hits enemies or blocks shots.

name: The Jar
description: When at full health, up to 4 extra Red Hearts can be stored in The Jar. Activating drops the stored hearts on the ground.

name: Flush!
description: Turns all non-boss monsters in the room into Poop. Instantly kills poop-themed bosses.

name: Satanic Bible
description: Gives one Black Heart.  Replaces the boss room item on the current floor with a Devil Deal.

name: Head of Krampus
description: Fires a powerful Brimstone beam in four cardinal directions, much like Krampus shoots. Fires a powerful Brimstone beam in four cardinal directions, much like Krampus shoots with a 50% chance to rotate all beams around Isaac 90 degrees.

name: Butter Bean
description: Upon use, Isaac farts and knocks back nearby enemies  and projectiles.  Enemies pushed into walls or obstacles take 12 damage.

name: Magic Fingers
description: Uses 1 Penny to deal damage to all enemies in the room.

name: Converter
description: Converts two Soul Hearts or Black Hearts into one filled Red Heart Container. Converts one Soul Heart or Black Heart into one filled Red Heart Container.

name: Pandora's Box
description: Upon use, spawns specific pickups or items depending on the floor it is used on. Disappears after use.

name: Unicorn Stump
description: Gives invulnerability and increased speed for six seconds, but removes the ability to shoot tears.

name: Taurus
description: -0.3 Speed. Isaac builds speed while in a room with enemies. At max speed, he gains the My Little Unicorn effect for 5 seconds.

name: Aries
description: +0.25 Speed. Running into enemies while at a high speed will deal damage.  Prevents Isaac from taking contact damage while moving at high speed.

name: Cancer
description: Adds 3 Soul Hearts. Grants The Wafer effect for the current room after taking damage.

name: Leo
description: Isaac can destroy rocks by walking into them.

name: Virgo
description: Adds a chance to give a shield that nullifies all incoming damage for 10 seconds upon taking damage. Also converts bad pills into good pills.

name: Libra
description: Gives 6 Coins, 6 Bombs, and 6 Keys and balances out all attributes.

name: Scorpio
description: Grants poison tears, which deal damage over time when inflicted.

name: Sagittarius
description: Increases speed by +0.2 and grants piercing tears.

name: Capricorn
description: Adds 1 Red Heart Container, gives +0.5 Damage, +0.1 Speed, +1.5 Range, and -1.0 Tear Delay, and gives 1 Bomb, Penny, and Key. Adds 1 Red Heart Container, gives +0.5 Damage, +0.1 Speed, +0.75 Range, and +0.5 Fire Rate, and gives 1 Bomb, Penny, and Key.

name: Aquarius
description: A trail of blue creep is left behind Isaac, which damages enemies.  The creep inherits most of Isaac's tear effects, like homing, etc.

name: Pisces
description: -1 Tear Delay, adds knock-back shots and increases tear size. +0.5 Fire Rate, adds knock-back shots and increases tear size.

name: Eve's Mascara
description: Doubles damage, halves tears stat, and greatly reduces shot speed. Doubles damage, 0.66x tears multiplier, and greatly reduces shot speed.

name: Judas' Shadow
description: Upon death, respawns Isaac as Dark Judas with two Black Hearts in the previous room.

name: Maggy's Bow
description: Gives one Red Heart Container and doubles the healing provided by Red Hearts.  Also heals 1 Red Heart when obtained.

name: Holy Mantle
description: Grants a shield that negates the first instance of damage taken, once per room. Does not apply to or negate self-damage (Blood Donation Machines, etc).

name: Thunder Thighs
quote: "HP up + speed down + you feel stompy"
description: Destroys rocks upon contact with Isaac. Adds one Red Heart container and lowers Speed.

name: Strange Attractor
description: Pickups, trinkets, and monsters are magnetically attracted to Isaac's tears.

name: Cursed Eye
description: Grants charged tears that can be fired in a tight burst. Getting hit while charging will teleport Isaac to another room.

name: Mysterious Liquid
description: Tears leave a small, short lasting pool of creep on impact or when their range is depleted.

name: Gemini
description: Spawns a conjoined familiar which chases enemies close to Isaac, dealing ~8 damage per second.

name: Cain's Other Eye
description: Spawns a familiar that slowly floats around the room on a zig-zag pattern and shoots normal tears in the same direction as Isaac. Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and fires tears in random cardinal directions that copy Isaac's tears and tear effects and scale with damage.

name: ???'s Only Friend
description: Spawns a controllable familiar that deals 37.5 damage per second on touch. It can be moved using the shooting directional keys

name: Samson's Chains
description: Attaches a ball and chain to Isaac that pulls behind him that damages enemies, blocks shots, and destroys most Obstacles.

name: Mongo Baby
description: Spawns a familiar that copies the tears of Isaac's other familiars.

name: Isaac's Tears
description: Fires 8 tears around Isaac, which retain the damage, range, shot speed, and special tear effects of his tears. Each tear shot by Isaac increases item charge by one.  Tears from this item have a +5 flat damage bonus.

name: Undefined
description: Teleports Isaac to the Secret Room, Super Secret Room, Treasure Room, or I AM ERROR.

name: Scissors
description: Turns Isaac's head into a stationary familiar for the current room which fires tears automatically.  Isaac's body also shoots a controllable fountain of blood shots for the room.

name: Breath of Life
description: Grants a brief moment of invincibility when the charge bar hits zero. Isaac begins taking damage if the item is held any longer.  Isaac creates beams of light when touching enemies while invulnerable, and creates a powerful 4-way beam if blocking damage exactly as the invincibility starts.

name: The Polaroid
description: If Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, he gains a shield that nullifies all types of damage for 5 seconds. Allows entrance into Chest.  Also allows access to Home.

name: The Negative
description: If Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, all enemies in the room take significant damage. Allows entrance into the Dark Room.  +1 Damage and also allows access to Home.

name: The Ludovico Technique
description: Instead of firing tears, Isaac controls one floating tear that hover over obstacles. This tear deals constant damage when held in place over an enemy.

name: Soy Milk
description: Tears are smaller and do much less damage, but fire in very rapid succession.

name: Godhead
description: Grants homing tears with a damaging halo. +0.5 Damage, -0.3 Tears -0.3 Shot Speed, +0.8 Tear Falling Speed, and +1.2 Range. Grants homing tears with a damaging halo. +0.5 Damage, -0.3 Tears, and -0.3 Shot Speed.

name: Lazarus' Rags
description: Upon dying, resurrect as Lazarus Risen in the current room with one Red Heart container and Anemic. Upon dying, resurrect as Lazarus Risen in the current room with one less Red Heart container, Anemic, and +0.5 Damage. Transform into Lazarus when reaching the next floor.

name: The Mind
description: Reveals the entire map, including all special rooms and Secret Rooms.

name: The Body
description: Adds 3 Red Heart Containers.

name: The Soul
description: Grants two Soul Hearts. Isaac gains a pulsing aura that repels enemies and projectiles.

name: Dead Onion
description: Grants piercing and spectral tears. Increases tear size (without increasing damage) while greatly reducing range and shot speed.

name: Broken Watch
description: Slows all enemies in every fourth newly-discovered room, with a small chance to speed them up instead.

name: The Boomerang
description: Throws a boomerang which retrieves pickups, as well as damages and petrifies enemies hit for 2 seconds.

name: Safety Pin
description: Grants one Black Heart, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed, +0.16 shot speed. Grants one Black Heart, +2.5 range, +0.16 shot speed.

name: Caffeine Pill
description: Grants +0.3 speed, reduces character size, and gives a random pill.

name: Torn Photo
description: +0.7 tears, +0.16 shot speed.

name: Blue Cap
description: Gives one full Red Heart container, +0.7 tears, and -0.16 shot speed.  Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

name: Latch Key
description: Grants 1 Soul Heart and +1 luck. Spawns 2 Keys.

name: Match Book
description: Grants Isaac one Black Heart, spawns two or three Bombs.

name: Synthoil
description: +1 damage, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed. +1 damage, +2.5 range.

name: A Snack
description: Grants one full Red Heart container.  Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

name: Diplopia
description: Duplicates all pickups and item pedestals in the room.

name: Placebo
description: Has the same effect as the Pill currently held by Isaac.  The charge time is based on the power of the pill.

name: Wooden Nickel
description: When used, has a roughly 50% chance to drop a penny, nickel or dime.

name: Toxic Shock
description: Upon entering a room, poisons all enemies, dealing double Isaac's tear damage. Killing enemies leaves a small, short-lasting pool of green creep on the ground.

name: Mega Bean
description: Petrifies all enemies in the current room for about 1.5 seconds, poisons any enemies near Isaac, and sends a rock wave across the room in the direction Isaac is facing.

name: Glass Cannon
description: Fires a high-damage piercing spectral tear, but lowers Isaac's health to half a heart. Fires a high-damage piercing spectral tear. If Isaac takes damage while holding this, he takes extra damage and it becomes Broken Glass Cannon.

name: Bomber Boy
description: +5 Bombs. Isaac's bombs will now explode in a large cross-shaped pattern (roughly 5 bombs explosions wide). This also affects player-spawned Troll Bombs.

name: Crack Jacks
description: Grants one full Red Heart container and drops a random trinket.

name: Mom's Pearls
description: +1.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed, +1 luck. +2.5 range, +1 luck. Grants one Soul Heart.

name: Car Battery
description: Causes Isaac's activated item to activate twice on each use.

name: Box of Friends
description: Duplicates all of Isaac's familiars for the current room. If Isaac has no familiars, spawns a Demon Baby for the room instead.

name: The Wiz
description: Grants spectral tears. Tears simultaneously fire out of both eyes diagonally, similar to the effect of the R U a Wizard? pill.

name: 8 Inch Nails
description: +1.5 damage. Replaces Isaac's tears with nails, which have increased knockback.

name: Incubus
description: Spawns a demonic familiar that shoots tears identical to Isaac's in terms of damage, tears, and tear effects.

name: Fate's Reward
description: A blue head familiar that will follow Isaac and fire tears copying his tear effects and damage.

name: Lil Chest
description: Spawns a chest familiar that spawns a random pickup (25% chance) or trinket (10% chance) upon clearing a room.

name: Sworn Protector
description: Spawns an orbital familiar which does 105 damage per second and attracts and blocks enemy shots. Upon blocking 10 shots in a room, it drops an Eternal Heart.

name: Friend Zone
description: Spawns a white attack fly that orbits somewhere between Distant Admiration and Forever alone, dealing 45 damage per second.

name: Lost Fly
description: Spawns fly familiar that moves in a straight line and circles around the first wall or obstacle it hits, dealing 105 damage per second on contact. Spawns fly familiar that moves in a straight line and circles around the first wall or obstacle it hits, dealing 56 damage per second and forcing nearby enemies to attack it.

name: Scatter Bombs
description: +5 Bombs. Isaac's bombs explode into 2-4 tiny bombs.

name: Sticky Bombs
description: +5 Bombs. Bombs stick to enemies and spawn 2-4 Blue Spiders if they kill an enemy.  They also leave a long-lasting puddle of slowing white creep.

name: Epiphora
description: Shooting in one direction increases Isaac's rate of fire until the cap is reached. As soon as Isaac changes direction or stops shooting, rate of fire is reset to its normal amount.

name: Continuum
description: Grants spectral tears and increases range. Tears travel through walls and appear at the opposite side of the room.

name: Mr. Dolly
description: +0.7 tears, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed, Spawns a combination of 3 Red Hearts, Soul Hearts or Black Hearts on the floor when picked up. +0.7 tears, +2.5 range, spawns 3 random types of Hearts on the floor when picked up.

name: Curse of the Tower
description: Upon taking damage, spawns six Troll Bombs around the room, similar to the effect of XVI - The Tower.

name: Charged Baby
description: Spawns a familiar that occasionally drops a Lil' Battery, gives an active item charge, or petrifies all enemies in the room.

name: Dead Eye
description: Isaac's damage increases each time an enemy is hit. Damage is reset upon missing a shot.

name: Holy Light
description: Adds a chance to fire holy tears, which will create a damaging light beam in the area if they hit an enemy.

name: Host Hat
description: A host familiar that sits on Isaac's head and has a random chance to block enemy shots and retaliate with 3 tears. Grants immunity to explosions.

name: Restock
description: Causes Shops to instantly restock their items when they are bought.  Outside of Greed Mode, the restocked item's cost is increased after each purchase.

name: Bursting Sack
description: Spider enemies no longer target or deal contact damage to Isaac.

name: No. 2
description: Continuously firing tears for three seconds causes Isaac to drop a Butt Bomb, which damages and confuses all enemies in the room when it explodes.

name: Pupula Duplex
description: Gives Isaac spectral tears and gives his tears a wide arc shape, increasing their size.

name: Pay to Play
description: +5 Coins. Most doors require one Penny to open instead of a Key. +5 Coins. All locked doors, Locked Chests, and Key Blocks must be opened with one Penny instead of Keys.

name: Eden's Blessing
description: +0.7 tears up. Grants a random item at the start of the next run.

name: Friendly Ball
description: Throwing the ball at a monster instantly kills and captures it. The captured enemy can later be released and will be friendly, fighting for Isaac and persisting between rooms.

name: Tear Detonator
description: Splits all of Isaac's tears that are currently in the air into 6 tears that fire in all directions, which retain their damage and shot speed.

name: Lil Gurdy
description: A Gurdy Jr. familiar that charges up while Isaac is firing, bouncing around the room when released and dealing contact damage based on its speed.

name: Bumbo
description: Spawns a beggar familiar which picks up any nearby coins, leveling up after collecting several coins. At level 2, Bumbo gains a body. At level 3, it begins to fire tears. At level 4, Bumbo follows enemies and gains contact damage.

name: D12
description: Re-rolls all Rocks and Metal Blocks in the current room into other random obstacles. Re-rolls most types of Obstacles in the current room into other random obstacles.

name: Censer
description: Spawns a familiar which creates a circular aura that slows down enemies and enemy shots inside.

name: Key Bum
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and collects Keys for himself, giving random Chests in return.

name: Rune Bag
description: Spawns a familiar that drops a random rune after clearing enough rooms.

name: Seraphim
description: Spawns an angel familiar who follows Isaac and fires homing tears which deal 10 damage and have 75% shot speed.

name: Betrayal
description: Charms all enemies in the room when Isaac takes damage. Enemies are able to damage each other. If an enemy is damaged by another enemy, they will attack that enemy instead of Isaac.

name: Zodiac
description: Gives Isaac a random zodiac item effect that changes every floor.

name: Serpent's Kiss
description: Tears have a chance to apply a poison effect to enemies. Isaac poisons enemies on contact. Poisoned enemies have a chance to drop a Black Heart when killed.

name: Marked
description: Isaac will automatically fire tears directed at a red target on the ground. The target can be moved with tear controls. +0.7 tears, increases range.

name: Tech X
description: Tears are replaced with laser rings that pierce through enemies and deal damage to enemies within them. Can be charged to increase the effectiveness of the ring.

name: Ventricle Razor
description: Creates up to two portals that remain even if Isaac leaves the room. Upon entering a portal, Isaac is teleported to the other portal.

name: Tractor Beam
description: Isaac emits a beam from his face that his tears are bound to.  Increases Tears, Range, and Shot Speed.  Increases Fire Rate, Range, and Shot Speed.

name: God's Flesh
description: Tears have a chance to shrink enemies, making them run away from Isaac. Shrunk enemies can be crushed and killed by walking over them.

name: Maw Of The Void
description: Charged by firing for 2.5 seconds and when released, creates a black ring around Isaac that rapidly deals damage.  +1 damage, the ring can cause enemies to drop Black Hearts.

name: Spear Of Destiny
description: In addition to tears, Isaac holds a spear in front of him which deals contact damage equal to 2x his tear damage, and occasionally inflicts fear.

name: Explosivo
description: Isaac's tears have a chance to stick to enemies and explode.

name: Chaos
description: Drops 1-6 random pickups on the floor. Causes items to be chosen from random item pools.

name: Spider Mod
description: Displays Isaac's tear damage and enemy health bars. Spawns a familiar that wanders around and inflicts random status effects on enemies it touches. Can spawn a Lil' Battery/Blue spider upon clearing a room.

name: Farting Baby
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and blocks enemy shots. If a shot hits Farting Baby, it has a chance to fart, which charms, poisons, or knocks back nearby enemies.

name: GB Bug
description: Spawns a familiar that bounces diagonally around the room, applying a random status effect to enemies it hits and has a chance to re-roll pickups it passes over. Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac. Double tapping the fire button launches it forward, causing it to reroll the first monster or pickup it hits.

name: D8
description: Re-rolls Isaac's damage, tears, range, and speed.

name: Purity
description: Boosts one of Isaac's stats depending on the color of the aura around him. The aura disappears upon taking damage and reappears with a random color upon entering a new room. Red boosts damage, blue boosts tears, yellow boosts speed, and orange boosts range.

name: Athame
description: When Isaac takes damage, a damaging black ring briefly appears around him. This ring can cause enemies to drop Black Hearts. After Isaac kills an enemy, adds a luck-based chance to spawn a damaging black ring around them.

name: Empty Vessel
description: Grants two Black Hearts. While Isaac has no red hearts, grants flight and periodically grants an invincibility shield for a few seconds.

name: Evil Eye
description: Adds a chance to fire a slow-moving eye that fires tears in the same direction as Isaac. The eye is destroyed when it hits an enemy or obstacle.

name: Lusty Blood
description: Isaac's damage increases for the current room each time he kills an enemy.

name: Cambion Conception
description: After taking damage a certain amount of times, a permanent demonic familiar spawns.

name: Immaculate Conception
description: Upon picking up a certain amount of health, spawn a permanent angelic familiar.

name: More Options
description: Two item pedestals are presented in every Treasure Room. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.

name: Crown Of Light
description: +2 Soul Hearts. While Isaac has no empty red hearts, grants 2x damage, increased range, and -0.3 shot speed. Regardless of health, the crown deactivates for the current room when Isaac takes damage.

name: Deep Pockets
description: Allows Isaac to carry two cards or pills (or a combination of both) at the same time. Increases the coin cap to 999. If a room would otherwise yield no reward, 1-3 coins will spawn.

name: Succubus
description: Spawns a flying familiar that bounces around the room with a black aura, dealing rapid damage to any enemies inside it. While standing in the aura, Isaac gains a 1.5x tear damage multiplier.

name: Fruit Cake
description: Isaac's tears gain a random effect that changes every shot.

name: Teleport 2.0
description: Teleports Isaac to a room that has not been explored yet. Normal rooms are prioritized over special rooms, and common special rooms take priority over rarer ones.

name: Black Powder
description: Isaac leaves a trail of black powder on the floor. Walking in a circle will spawn a pentagram symbol on the floor, which deals 10 damage per tick to any enemies inside it.

name: Kidney Bean
description: Isaac farts, charming all nearby enemies.

name: Glowing Hourglass
description: Rewinds time, putting Isaac back in the previous room and undoing anything that happened in the current room.  Can only be used three times per floor, after which it functions like The Hourglass until the next floor.

name: Circle of Protection
description: Surrounds Isaac with a large white halo that occasionally deals Isaac's tear damage to enemies inside it, and can convert enemy shots into friendly homing tears.

name: Sack Head
description: Spawns a Grab Bag on pickup. Coins, Bombs, Keys, cards, runes and batteries have a chance to become Grab Bags.

name: Night Light
description: A cone of light shines in the direction Isaac is moving that slows enemies and enemy shots.

name: Obsessed Fan
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a delay and deals 30 contact damage per second to enemies.

name: Mine Crafter
description: Places a Movable TNT barrel that can be pushed and used to destroy rocks or damage enemies. If used again in the same room while the previous TNT barrel is still intact, remotely detonates the TNT.

name: PJs
description: Grants 4 Soul Hearts and fully restores Isaac's health.

name: Head of the Keeper
description: Isaac's tears become coins and now have a chance to drop Pennies on the floor upon successfully hitting an enemy.

name: Papa Fly
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 3 second delay, firing tears at nearby enemies.

name: Multidimensional Baby
description: Spawns a familiar that will follow Isaac's movements on a 2.5-second delay. Tears that pass through the baby will be doubled and increase in speed.

name: Glitter Bombs
description: +5 Bombs. Bombs have a chance to drop random pickups or charm enemies when they explode.

name: My Shadow
description: Inflicts fear on all enemies in the room upon taking damage and spawns black friendly Chargers that attack enemies.Spawns a shadow familiar that closely follows behind Isaac. It spawns a black friendly Charger whenever an enemy touches it.

name: Jar of Flies
description: Killing an enemy adds a fly to the jar, up to a maximum of 20. On use, releases Blue Flies equal to the number of flies in the jar.

name: Lil Loki
description: Spawns a Loki familiar that follows Isaac and fires 4 tears in a cross pattern.

name: Milk!
description: Spawns a glass familiar that spills on the floor upon taking damage.  After the milk spills, Isaac's tear delay is decreased by 2 for the current room.  After the milk spills, Isaac's fire rate is increased by 1 for the current room.

name: D7
description: Restarts the current room and brings back all enemies, allowing more rewards to be acquired by completing the room.

name: Binky
description: Grants one Soul Heart, +0.75 tears and decreases Isaac's size.

name: Mom's Box
description: Increases luck by 1 and doubles the effects of trinkets while held. When used, drops a random trinket on the ground.

name: Kidney Stone
description: Randomly while firing tears, Isaac will stop firing and turn red, where he will charge and release a lot of 'tears' in one go. The burst of tears also includes a kidney stone, which deals a lot of damage.

name: Mega Blast
description: Upon use, Isaac fires a laser similar to the one used by Mega Satan. This laser deals massive damage, lasts for approximately 15 seconds, and persists between rooms. Isaac is pushed backwards by the force of the laser while it is active.

name: Dark Prince's Crown
description: When at exactly one Red Heart, increases tears, range, tear falling speed, and shot speed. When at exactly one Red Heart, increases fire rate, range, and shot speed.

name: Apple!
description: +0.3 tears. Adds a chance to fire a razor blade that deals 4x Isaac's damage.

name: Lead Pencil
description: After every 15 tears fired, Isaac will fire a high-damage cluster of tears.

name: Dog Tooth
description: +0.3 damage, +0.1 speed. Plays a howl or bark sound when entering a room with undiscovered Secret Rooms or Crawl Spaces.

name: Dead Tooth
description: While firing, Isaac gains a green aura that poisons nearby enemies.

name: Linger Bean
description: Constantly shooting causes Isaac to release gas clouds that can be pushed by his tears and damage nearby enemies.

name: Shard of Glass
description: Upon taking damage, Isaac has a chance to drop a full red heart, gain 5 range, and leave a trail of damaging red creep for the current room. Taking damage causes Isaac to bleed, spraying a volley of blood in the direction he fires. Bleeding will eventually damage him, but it can be stopped by picking up a Red Heart.

name: Metal Plate
description: Grants one Soul Heart. Enemy shots have a chance to be reflected at the shooter as confusing tears.

name: Eye of Greed
description: Every 20 tears, Isaac loses 1 Penny and shoots an additional gold tear that petrifies enemies and turns them into gold. Any enemy killed while in this state will drop coins.

name: Tarot Cloth
description: Drops a random card or rune.  Doubles the effects of most cards and runes.  Doubles the effects of tarot cards.

name: Varicose Veins
description: Taking damage releases a ring of 10 high damage tears.

name: Compound Fracture
description: Increases Range. Tears turn into bones, which shatter into 1-3 bone shards upon hitting an enemy or obstacle.

name: Polydactyly
description: Allows Isaac to carry two cards, pills, or any combination of both. Spawns one random card, rune, or pill.

name: Dad's Lost Coin
description: +1.5 range, +1 tear falling speed. Drops a Lucky Penny.+2.5 range. Drops a Lucky Penny.

name: Midnight Snack
description: Grants one full Red Heart container.  Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

name: Cone Head
description: Grants a Soul Heart. Gives Isaac a chance to ignore any damage taken.

name: Belly Button
description: Drops a random trinket. Grants a second trinket slot.

name: Sinus Infection
description: Adds a chance to fire a booger that sticks to enemies and deals damage over time.

name: Glaucoma
description: Adds a chance to shoot tears that confuse enemies for an extremely long time.

name: Parasitoid
description: Adds a chance to fire an egg sack which creates slowing creep and spawns a Blue Fly or Blue Spider upon hitting an enemy.

name: Eye of Belial
description: Grants piercing tears. After piercing one enemy, tears start homing and deal double damage.

name: Sulfuric Acid
description: +0.3 damage. Adds a chance to fire acidic tears which can destroy obstacles and open doors.

name: Glyph of Balance
description: Grants 2 Soul Hearts and modifies drops from Champion monsters based on certain conditions.  Also modifies room clear drops.

name: Analog Stick
description: +0.35 tears up. Allows Isaac to fire tears diagonally.

name: Contagion
description: The first enemy killed in a room explodes and poisons nearby enemies. Poisoned enemies will also explode upon death.

name: Finger!
description: Spawns a finger familiar that faces in the same direction as Isaac, rapidly damaging enemies it points at for 10% of Isaac's damage.

name: Shade
description: Spawns a shadow familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 1 second delay and deals contact damage to enemies. After dealing enough damage, it is absorbed by Isaac and spawns friendly Chargers.

name: Depression
description: Spawns a familiar that leaves a trail of creep that damages enemies at 6 damage per second. Has a chance to spawn damaging beams of light onto enemies that touch the cloud.

name: Hushy
description: Spawns a Hush familiar that bounces diagonally around the room and deals contact damage. While firing tears, it stops moving.

name: Lil Monstro
description: Spawns a familiar that fires clusters of tears. Must be charged before shooting.

name: King Baby
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and makes other familiars follow it. While firing tears, other familiars stop moving.

name: Big Chubby
description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and charges across the room when Isaac fires, blocking shots and dealing 40.5 damage per second on contact.

name: Broken Glass Cannon
description: Begins with no charges and turns into Glass Cannon when used. Only acquired by taking damage while holding Glass Cannon.

name: Plan C
description: Kills all enemies in the room, then kills Isaac three seconds later.

name: D1
description: Duplicates a random pickup in the room.  The new pickup may be different than the original (i.e. a different card, etc).

name: Void
description: Consumes all pedestal items in the room. Active items will have their effects added to Void, and passive items will grant random stat upgrades.

name: Pause
description: Freezes all enemies until a fire button is pressed.

name: Smelter
description: Consumes Isaac's currently held trinket and applies its effect permanently.

name: Compost
description: Doubles Isaac's Blue Flies and Blue Spiders, or spawns one if Isaac has none. Converts pickups in the current room into Blue Flies or Blue Spiders.

name: Dataminer
description: Displaces enemy sprites for the current room, randomly increases one stat and decreases another.

name: Clicker
description: Transforms Isaac into a random character and removes the last item collected.

name: Mama Mega!
description: Damages all enemies and destroys all obstacles. The effect occurs every time a new room is entered for the rest of the floor. Opens the doors to the floor's Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms.

name: Wait What?
quote: "I can't believe it's not butter bean!"
description: Isaac farts, sending out rock waves.

name: Crooked Penny
description: Spawns a penny and has a 50% chance to double all items and pickups in the room. If the effect fails, the items and pickups disappear.

name: Dull Razor
description: Hurts Isaac without depleting health, activating any items that trigger upon taking damage.

name: Potato Peeler
description: Removes a Heart Container, increases damage and range, and grants a Cube of Meat.

name: Metronome
description: Grants a random item effect for the current room.

name: D infinity
description: Grants a random die item that changes each use. Acts as any die item, and can by cycled by pressing the drop key.

name: Eden's Soul
description: Spawns two item pedestals then is consumed. Begins with no charges.

name: Acid Baby
description: Spawns a familiar that drops a random pill every 3 rooms. Upon using a pill, all enemies in the room are poisoned.

name: YO LISTEN!
description: +1 luck. Spawns a fairy familiar that points out Secret Rooms, Crawl Space entrances, and tinted rocks.

name: Adrenaline
description: Increases damage based on how many empty Red Heart containers Isaac has.

name: Jacob's Ladder
description: Tears fire sparks of electricity in random directions upon hitting an obstacle or enemy.

name: Ghost Pepper
description: Gives a chance to shoot fires alongside tears that block enemy shots and deal damage to enemies that touch them.Gives a chance to shoot blue fires alongside tears that become smaller as they travel.

name: Euthanasia
description: Adds a chance to fire needles that instantly kill basic enemies and deal triple damage to bosses. If a needle kills an enemy, it bursts into more tears/needles.

name: Camo Undies
description: Isaac becomes camouflaged at the beginning of each room. Until he shoots, all non-boss enemies will be confused.  Isaac gains +0.5 Speed while camouflaged, and gains Tears and Damage upon breaking it.

name: Duality
description: Whenever a Devil Room or Angel Room would spawn after defeating a boss, both rooms spawn. Only one can be entered.

name: Eucharist
description: An Angel Room door will always spawn after every boss fight, excluding the first floor and floors after Womb II/Utero II/Scarred Womb II.

name: Sack of Sacks
description: Spawns a familiar that drops a Grab Bag every 5-6 rooms cleared.

name: Greed's Gullet
description: Grants a Red Heart container for every 25 Coins Isaac has.

name: Large Zit
description: Adds a chance to fire a creep shot that deals double damage and leaves a trail of slowing white creep.

name: Little Horn
description: Adds a chance to fire a piercing tear that instantly kills any enemy that it touches. Adds a chance to fire a tear that summons Big Horn's hand to crush the first enemy it hits, instantly killing monsters or greatly damaging bosses.

name: Brown Nugget
description: Spawns a stationary fly turret that lasts for the current room and fires tears at nearby enemies.

name: Poke Go
description: Upon entering a room with enemies in it, has a chance to spawn a random friendly enemy that persists across rooms.

name: Backstabber
description: Isaac's tears deal double damage and inflict bleeding on enemies if they're facing away from Isaac.

name: Sharp Straw
description: Damages all enemies in the room. Has a chance to drop a Half Red Heart or Half Soul Heart if an enemy is hit. Damages all enemies in the room. Has a chance to drop a Half Red Heart if an enemy is hit.

name: Mom's Razor
description: Spawns an orbiting razor that deals contact damage and inflicts bleeding on enemies, causing them to slowly take damage over time.

name: Bloodshot Eye
description: Spawns an orbital familiar that deals 30 damage per second and fires a randomly angled tear every 2 seconds.

name: Delirious
description: Spawns Delirium as a random friendly boss that fights for Isaac.

name: Angry Fly
description: Spawns a fly familiar that orbits around a random enemy and deals 30 damage per second to enemies it comes in contact with.

name: Black Hole
description: Throws a black hole on the ground which sucks in and damages enemies.

name: Bozo
description: +0.1 flat damage, grants a Soul Heart. Enemies can randomly become briefly charmed or feared. Taking damage has a chance to spawn a Rainbow Poop.

name: Broken Modem
description: Enemies, enemy shots, tears, and pickups will briefly freeze in place at random intervals.

name: Mystery Gift
description: Upon use, spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, with a chance to spawn A Lump of Coal or The Poop instead.

name: Sprinkler
description: Upon use, creates a stationary sprinkler that rotates and fires tears in 8 directions. The tears copy Isaac's stats and most tear effects.

name: Fast Bombs
description: +7 Bombs. Removes the delay between bomb placements, allowing them to be placed rapidly.  Bombs will no longer knock each other away.

name: Buddy in a Box
description: Spawns a familiar with a random tear effect. The familiar is randomized at the start of each floor.

name: Lil Delirium
description: Grants a familiar that transforms into another random familiar every 10 seconds.

name: Jumper Cables
description: Grants an active item charge every 15 enemies killed.

name: Coupon
description: While held, guarantees one item in every Shop will be on sale. On use, makes a random item in the current room free.

name: Telekinesis
description: Upon use, for the next three seconds, any enemy shots that come near Isaac are held in place and then later reflected.

name: Moving Box
description: If the box is empty, picks up items and pickups in a room and stores them. If the box is not empty, places all stored items and pickups in the current room.  Can carry up to 10 items or pickups at once.

name: Technology Zero
description: Connects Isaac's tears with electricity that can damage enemies.

name: Leprosy
description: Upon taking damage, grants a body part as an orbital, which blocks enemy shots and deals 7 damage per tick to enemies it comes in contact with. The orbitals will be destroyed if they take enough damage from enemies or enemy shots.

name: 7 Seals
description: Spawns a random Harbinger familiar that changes every 10 seconds. Harbingers have different behaviors and spawn themed Locusts.

name: Mr. ME!
description: Summons a controllable ghost that can perform various tasks depending on what it targets.

name: Angelic Prism
description: Spawns an orbital familiar with a large orbital radius. Tears that pass through the prism split into four multi-colored tears.

name: Pop!
description: Replaces Isaac's tears with eyeballs that can bounce off of each other. The eyeballs are not limited by range, and will instead dissipate when they stop moving or when hitting an enemy or obstacle.

name: Death's List
description: Grants a pickup or stat upgrade if all enemies in a room are killed in the order they are marked.

name: Haemolacria
description: Tears are now fired in an arc. Upon hitting the floor, an obstacle, or an enemy, they burst into many smaller tears in all directions. Increases tear delay.

name: Lachryphagy
description: Isaac's tears decelerate as they travel. Upon stopping or hitting an obstacle, they burst into 8 tears in all directions. Tears can be fired into other tears to feed them, increasing their damage.

name: Trisagion
description: Tears are replaced with piercing white blasts of light that deal less damage but can damage the same enemy multiple times.

name: Schoolbag
description: Allows Isaac to hold two active items.

name: Blanket
description: Grants one Soul Heart. Upon entering a boss room, grants a shield that blocks one hit, then disappears.

name: Sacrificial Altar
description: Sacrifices up to 2 familiars and spawns an item for each familiar sacrificed. Converts all friendly spiders and flies into coins.

name: Lil Spewer
description: Drops a random pill, and spawns a familiar that charges up and fires creep. Using pills changes the creep type.

name: Marbles
description: Spawns 3 random trinkets. Taking damage has a 5% chance to swallow Isaac's currently held trinket, gaining its effect permanently.

name: Mystery Egg
description: Spawns an egg familiar, which cracks into a random friendly monster when Isaac is hurt. The egg regenerates upon entering a different room.

name: Flat Stone
description: Tears bounce off the floor, creating splashes. Splashes deal 25% of Isaac's tear damage to all enemies in a small area.

name: Marrow
description: Grants one Bone Heart and spawns three Red Hearts.

name: Slipped Rib
description: Spawns a bone familiar that circles around Isaac and reflects enemy shots.

name: Hallowed Ground
description: Spawns a white poop familiar, which turns into a White Poop when Isaac is hurt. White poop has an aura that increases tear fire rate and can block enemy shots.  The aura also increases damage by 20% and gives homing.

name: Pointy Rib
description: Spawns a bone familiar that hovers back and forth in front of Isaac, dealing damage equal to Isaac's damage.

name: Book of the Dead
description: Creates a friendly Bony, Black Bony, or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.Creates a friendly Bony, Black Bony, Bone Fly, Revenant, or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.

name: Dad's Ring
description: Creates a ring of light around Isaac that petrifies enemies in contact.

name: Divorce Papers
description: Grants one Bone Heart, +0.7 tears, spawns a Mysterious Paper.

name: Jaw Bone
description: Spawns a familiar that flies through the room while firing, dealing a flat 7 contact damage to enemies and retrieving pickups.

name: Brittle Bones
description: Replaces all Red Heart Containers with 6 empty Bone Hearts.  Upon losing a Bone Heart, Isaac fires bones in 8 directions and permanently gains a tears up.  Upon losing a Bone Heart, Isaac fires bones in 8 directions and permanently gains a fire rate up.

name: Mom's Shovel
description: Creates a trapdoor that leads to the next floor upon activation. Unlocks The Forgotten when used on a mound of dirt that appears in Dark Room.

name: Mucormycosis
description: Gives Isaac the chance to fire spore tears that stick to enemies and blow up after a few seconds, dealing damage and poisoning nearby enemies and releasing more spores.

name: 2Spooky
description: Enemies near Isaac are afflicted with fear.

name: Golden Razor
description: Spends five Pennies to increase Isaac's damage by 1.2 for the current room.

name: Sulfur
description: Grants Brimstone for the current room.

name: Fortune Cookie
description: Gives Isaac a fortune, Soul Heart, Card, Rune, or trinket, similar to a Fortune Telling Machine. Fortunes are much more likely to be given than anything else.

name: Eye Sore
description: Causes Isaac to occasionally fire extra tears in random directions while shooting.

name: 120 Volt
description: Repeatedly zaps enemies that are close to Isaac.

name: It Hurts
description: Releases a ring of tears and increases fire rate for the current room when Isaac takes damage.

name: Almond Milk
quote: "DMG down + tears up + you feel nutty"
description: Quadruples fire rate, with x0.3 damage multiplier. Each tear is a given random effect that alters its movement.

name: Rock Bottom
description: Locks Isaac's attributes to their highest values reached.

name: Nancy Bombs
description: +5 Bombs. Each bomb gains 1-4 random bomb synergies.

name: A Bar of Soap
description: Gives Isaac +0.5 Tears and +0.2 Shot Speed.

name: Blood Puppy
description: Spawns a familiar that chases enemies. After killing enough enemies, it becomes more powerful but will also try to hurt Isaac. Attacking it returns it to normal.

name: Dream Catcher
description: During the transition between floors, Isaac's nightmare shows the contents of the upcoming floor's Treasure Room, as well as the floor's boss. Grants a Half Soul Heart when entering a new floor.

name: Paschal Candle
description: Gives Isaac a familiar that grants +0.4 Fire Rate for each consecutive room he's cleared without taking damage. The bonus stacks up to five times.

name: Divine Intervention
description: Double tapping a fire key creates a shield that pushes away enemies and reflects enemy projectiles and lasers.

name: Blood Oath
description: Stabs Isaac at the beginning of each floor, draining his Red Hearts. Increases damage and speed for the floor based on the amount drained.

name: Playdough Cookie
description: Grants multicolored tears. Each color comes with a different status or tear effect.

name: Orphan Socks
description: Prevents creep and floor spikes from damaging Isaac. Also gives Isaac +0.3 speed and 2 Soul Hearts.

name: Eye of the Occult
description: +1 damage, +2 range, -0.16 shot speed. Isaac's tears can be controlled mid-flight with tear controls.

name: Immaculate Heart
description: Adds one Red Heart Container and fully restores health. x1.2 damage multiplier. Isaac will occasionally fire extra tears that orbit around him.

name: Monstrance
description: Isaac gains an aura that deals damage to enemies inside it.

name: The Intruder
description: A familiar burrows in Isaac's head, firing 4 slowing tears. Upon taking damage, there's a chance it will burst out of Isaac's head, spawning blue spiders and chasing enemies for the current room.

name: Dirty Mind
description: Destroying poop spawns Dip Familiars that follow Isaac and damage enemies. Destroying different types of poop spawns different Dips with special effects.

name: Damocles
quote: "A king's fortune... but at what cost?"
description: Spawns a sword above Isaac's head, which doubles all item pedestals. After Isaac takes damage, the sword can randomly fall at any point, instantly killing him.

name: Free Lemonade
description: Creates a large pool of yellow creep beneath Isaac.

name: Spirit Sword
description: Instead of tears, Isaac swings a sword. Charging does a spin attack and fires a projectile, and a projectile is sometimes fired with normal swings if Isaac has no empty Red Heart Containers.

name: Red Key
description: Creates a Red Room adjacent to a viable wall, indicated by the outline of a door. These rooms have a 10% chance to be a special room.

name: Psy Fly
description: Spawns a fly orbital familiar that chases and blocks enemy shots.

name: Wavy Cap
description: Increases fire rate, decreases speed, and distorts the screen. All effects become more pronounced with repeated use, and wear off by clearing rooms.

name: Rocket in a Jar
description: +5 Bombs. If Isaac is currently firing, placing a bomb will instead shoot a fast-moving, explosive rocket in the direction he's facing.

name: Book of Virtues
description: On use, spawns a destroyable orbiting wisp familiar that fires tears and deals contact damage. Also acts as a passive item that causes other active items to spawn themed wisps.

name: Alabaster Box
description: Spawns three Soul Hearts and two Angel Room items and is consumed. Starts with no charges, and can only be charged by picking up 6 Soul Hearts.

name: The Stairway
quote: "May you get what you came for"
description: Generates a ladder at the start of every floor that leads to a unique Angel Room shop.

name: Sol
description: Reveals the location of the Boss Room. Upon defeating a boss, activates XIX - The Sun, fully recharges Isaac's active item, grants bonus damage and luck for the rest of the floor, and removes curses.

name: Luna
description: Adds an extra Secret Room and Super Secret Room to each floor. Secret Rooms contain a beam of light that increases Fire Rate for the current floor and gives a Half Soul Heart.

name: Mercurius
description: +0.4 speed. Doors stay open after entering a room, even in rooms with enemies.

name: Venus
description: Adds one red Heart container. Heals 1 additional Red Heart. Enemies near Isaac become charmed.

name: Terra
description: +1 Damage. Replaces tears with rocks that deal variable damage, have increased knockback, and can destroy obstacles.

name: Mars
description: Dash by double-tapping the movement key, becoming invulnerable and damaging enemies. There's a short cooldown before Isaac can dash again.

name: Jupiter
description: +2 red Heart containers, -0.3 speed. Isaac builds speed while standing still, and releases poison gas clouds when he moves afterwards.

name: Saturnus
description: Upon entering a room, a circle of tears orbits Isaac. Enemy tears have a chance to be caught in orbit, turning them friendly.

name: Uranus
description: Isaac shoots ice tears, which slow enemies and freeze monsters they kill. Frozen enemies slide away and explode into ice shards when touched.

name: Neptunus
description: Isaac's mouth fills with tears over time while not firing, up to a cap. Holding the fire button will release all stored tears in rapid succession.

name: Pluto
description: +0.7 tears. Significantly shrinks Isaac, allowing him to squeeze between objects and makes some enemy shots pass over him.

name: Voodoo Head
description: Spawns an additional Curse Room on each floor. Curse Rooms have improved layouts.

name: Eye Drops
description: Increases the fire rate in Isaac's left eye, causing his eyes to fire at different rates.

name: Act of Contrition
description: Increases tears and grants an Eternal Heart. Allows Angel Rooms to appear even if a Devil Deal has been taken before. Reduces the Devil/Angel room chance penalty for taking Red heart damage.

name: Member Card
description: Adds a trapdoor to every Shop that leads to a second shop with a unique stock and marked-up prices.

name: Battery Pack
description: Recharges Isaac's currently held active item and drops 2-4 batteries.

name: Mom's Bracelet
description: Lets Isaac pick up and throw rocks, TNT, Poops, friendly Dips, Bombs, and other obstacles.

name: The Scooper
description: Summons The Peeper for the current room, which leaves a trail of red creep.

name: Ocular Rift
description: Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that create rifts where they land, which damage nearby enemies and pull in enemies, pickups, and tears/shots from all sources.

name: Boiled Baby
description: Gives Isaac a familiar that fires chaotic bursts of tears in all directions.

name: Freezer Baby
description: Spawns a shooting familiar that has a chance to petrify enemies, and freezes monsters upon killing them.

name: Eternal D6
description: Rerolls all items in the room. Each item has a 25% chance to disappear instead.

name: Bird Cage
description: The first time Isaac takes damage in a room, a familiar leaps on an enemy, dealing damage and releasing a rock wave. For the rest of the room, it chases enemies similar to Dead Bird.

name: Larynx
description: Isaac shouts, damaging and pushing away nearby enemies. The shout gets stronger the more charges the item has. Can also be charged by taking damage.

name: Lost Soul
description: Creates a ghostly familiar that closely follows behind Isaac. It dies in one hit, but respawns at the start of the next floor. Each time it survives until the next floor, it rewards Isaac with Soul Hearts, Eternal Hearts, or an Item.

name: Blood Bombs
description: Grants a Red Heart container and restores 5 hearts. Bombs leave behind damaging red creep. Isaac can place Bombs at the cost of half a heart if he doesn't have any.

name: Lil Dumpy
description: Spawns a Dumpy familiar that pushes away nearby enemies and projectiles just before Isaac is about to be hit, then falls asleep. He can be awoken by walking to him.

name: Bird's Eye
description: Gives a chance to shoot fires alongside tears that block enemy shots and deal damage to enemies that touch them.

name: Lodestone
description: Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that magnetize enemies they hit, causing them to attract nearby pickups and enemies, as well as tears/shots from all sources.

name: Rotten Tomato
description: Adds a chance to fire tears that mark enemies with the Bait status effect. Enemies marked as bait are attacked by other enemies.

name: Birthright
description: Grants a character-specific effect that enhances their special abilities.

name: Red Stew
description: Refills all heart containers. Grants an enormous damage boost that wears off over time.

name: Genesis
description: Removes all of Isaac's items and pickups and takes him to a unique Bedroom with some pickups and Chests and a trapdoor to the next floor. For every item Isaac lost, he gets to take an item from a set of three.

name: Sharp Key
description: Adds 5 Keys on pickup. Allows Isaac to throw his keys to deal damage to enemies, destroy obstacles, and open doors.

name: Booster Pack
description: Drops 5 random cards.

name: Mega Mush
description: Gigantifies Isaac for 30 seconds, increasing damage and range while lowering tears, granting invulnerability, and allowing Isaac to crush enemies and obstacles he walks on. The effect persists between rooms.

name: Knife Piece 1
description: Combined with Knife Piece 2, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the Corpse.

name: Knife Piece 2
description: Combined with Knife Piece 1, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the Corpse.

name: Death Certificate
description: Takes Isaac to an abandoned and expanded version of Home, which has one copy of every item in the game. After taking an item, Isaac returns to the room he used Death Certificate in.

name: Bot Fly
description: Spawns an orbiting fly familiar that fires shielded tears at incoming enemy projectiles.

name: Meat Cleaver
description: Splits all enemies in the room into two smaller versions of themselves with much less health.

name: Evil Charm
description: +2 luck. Provides immunity to burn, confusion, fear, and poison.

name: Dogma
description: Grants flight, +2 damage, and increases speed to 1.1. Grants enough health to have 6 full hearts, if possible. Grants the Holy Mantle effect for the room it was obtained in. Automatically given to Isaac after defeating Dogma.

name: Purgatory
description: While in a room with enemies, spawns cracks on the ground. Walking over these cracks summons ghosts that launch themselves at enemies and explode.

name: Stitches
description: Passively spawns a familiar that moves in the direction Isaac shoots. On use, Isaac swaps places with the familiar.

name: R Key
description: Brings Isaac back to the first floor of a new run, retaining all of his items.

name: Knockout Drops
description: Adds a chance to shoot a fist tear that has extremely high knockback and confuses enemies.

name: Eraser
description: Throws an eraser that instantly kills the first monster it hits, and prevents that monster from spawning for the rest of the run. Can only be used once per floor.

name: Yuck Heart
description: Gives Isaac a Rotten Heart.

name: Urn of Souls
description: Spews a stream of damaging flame. Gains Soul Charges each time an enemy dies, which are used to fuel the urn.

name: Akeldama
description: While in an uncleared room, Isaac forms a trail of bloody tears that drags behind him, bursting and dealing damage upon contact with enemies.

name: Magic Skin
description: Consumes one heart container or two Soul Hearts to spawn an item and give Isaac a broken heart container that can never be filled. If Magic Skin isn't being held after being used, it is very likely to replace any future items.

name: Revelation
description: Grants flight and two Soul Hearts. In addition to tears, Isaac can charge up and fire a powerful holy laser.

name: Consolation Prize
description: Increases Isaac's lowest stat and drops either 3 Coins, 1 Bomb, or 1 Key depending on what Isaac has the least of.

name: Tinytoma
description: Gives Isaac a Teratoma orbital that blocks shots, deals contact damage, and splits into smaller versions of itself upon taking damage. The smaller versions break into blue spiders.

name: Brimstone Bombs
description: +5 Bombs. Bombs fire four Brimstone lasers in the cardinal directions upon exploding.

name: 4.5 Volt
description: Active items don't charge when clearing rooms. Instead, they're charged by dealing damage to enemies.

name: Fruity Plum
description: Gives Isaac a miniature Baby Plum familiar that propels itself diagonally around the room, firing tears behind itself as it travels.

name: Plum Flute
description: Summons the boss Baby Plum to fight for Isaac in the current room.

name: Star of Bethlehem
description: Spawns a star familiar that slowly travels towards the Boss Room, giving an aura that increases damage and tears and grants homing tears.

name: Cube Baby
description: Spawns an ice cube familiar that slides around when walked into. It slows and deals contact damage, freezing monsters it kills.

name: Vade Retro
description: While held, enemies leave behind ghosts on death. Stronger enemies leave bigger ghosts. Using the item causes the ghosts to explode and damage nearby enemies, and instantly kills all ghost enemies with less than 50% HP.

name: False PHD
description: Converts good pills into bad pills and identifies all pills. Bad pills now have secondary positive effects. Grants one Black Heart.

name: Spin to Win
description: When used, gives Isaac +0.5 speed and greatly increases the rotation speed of Isaac's orbitals for 3 seconds. Gives Isaac a spinning top orbital that blocks enemy shots and deals contact damage to enemies while held.

name: Vasculitis
description: Enemies explode into tears upon death, which inherit the effects of Isaac's tears.

name: Giant Cell
description: Causes Isaac to spawn micro-Isaacs when he takes damage, which chase and shoot at nearby enemies.

name: Tropicamide
description: +2.5 Range, Increases tear size.

name: Card Reading
description: Spawns two portals at the beginning of each floor that each lead to either the Boss Room, Treasure Room, or Secret Room.

name: Quints
description: The first five enemies killed in a room will spawn stationary shooting familiars where they died.

name: Tooth and Nail
description: Isaac periodically turns into a spiked statue, briefly becoming invulnerable and dealing contact damage.

name: Binge Eater
description: +1 Red Heart Container and fully heals Isaac. Item pedestals also offer a random food item. Picking up a food item temporarily grants +3.6 damage and permanently boosts 2 stats.

name: Guppy's Eye
description: Shows the contents of Chests, Fire Places, Grab Bags, and Shopkeepers before they're opened/destroyed.

name: Strawman
description: Spawns a controllable Keeper to fight enemies alongside Isaac, functioning similarly to Jacob and Esau. If Keeper dies, he spawns 5 blue spiders and Strawman is removed from Isaac's inventory.

name: Dad's Note
description: Sends Isaac on an Ascent toward Home.

name: Sausage
description: Adds a Red Heart Container, fully heals Isaac, and gives +0.2 Speed, +0.5 Damage, +0.5 Tears, +2.5 Range, +0.2 Shot Speed, and +1.0 Luck. Increases the chance of encountering a Devil Room, Angel Room, and/or Planetarium each by 6.9%.

name: Options?
description: If a room gives a reward when cleared, there will be two different rewards to chose from. Taking one causes the other to disappear.

name: Candy Heart
description: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he heals with Red Heart pickups.

name: A Pound of Flesh
description: Devil deals now cost Coins, Shop items now cost health, and consumables in shops are free but surrounded by spikes.

name: Redemption
description: If Isaac enters a Devil Room, but leaves without taking/opening anything in it (including Black Hearts, etc.), he gets +1 Damage and a Soul Heart at the start of the next floor.

name: Spirit Shackles
description: On death, Isaac's ghost is chained to his dead body and he can continue to fight with 1/2 of a heart, returning to life after 10 seconds. After it activates, it must be recharged by picking up a Soul Heart.

name: Cracked Orb
description: Unlocks doors and reveals a random room on the map when Isaac takes damage.

name: Empty Heart
description: If Isaac has one red heart or fewer at the beginning of a floor, he gains an empty red heart container.

name: Astral Projection
description: Causes Isaac to turn into a ghost if he gets hit while in an uncleared room, giving him flight and spectral tears and blocking the next hit he takes.

name: C Section
description: Replaces tears with fetuses that chase down enemies and deal contact damage. Each shot requires a brief charge up.

name: Lil Abaddon
description: Spawns a familiar that charges a miniature Maw Of The Void attack while Isaac shoots.

name: Montezuma's Revenge
description: While firing, Isaac charges up a short-ranged Brimstone-like diarrhea beam that shoots behind him.

name: Lil Portal
description: A familiar that flies forward, consuming pickups in its path. Each one will increase its size and damage and spawn a Blue Fly. Every four pickups, it opens a portal that leads to an unexplored room.

name: Worm Friend
description: Gives Isaac a Nerve Ending familiar that burrows out of the ground to grab and deal damage to enemies over time.

name: Bone Spurs
description: Enemies spawn floating bones on death, which block shots and damage/repel enemies that touch them.

name: Hungry Soul
description: Enemies have a chance to spawn ghosts on death, which chase and deal contact damage to enemies and explode after a short time.

name: Jar of Wisps
description: Spawns random wisps that shoot various tears, block shots, and deal contact damage. The number of wisps spawned increases every time the jar is used.

name: Soul Locket
description: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he picks up a Soul Heart.

name: Friend Finder
description: Spawns a random friendly monster that mimics Isaac's movements and attacks.

name: Inner Child
description: Upon death, Isaac respawns in the current room with half of a Red Heart, a massive size down, and +0.2 Speed.

name: Glitched Crown
description: Item pedestals cycle between 5 random items before being picked up.

name: Belly Jelly
description: Causes enemies to bounce off of Isaac, dealing damage to them if they hit an enemy or obstacle. Also gives Isaac the chance to deflect enemy shots.

name: Sacred Orb
description: Prevents items of quality 0-1 from appearing, and items of quality 2 from appearing 33% of the time, greatly increasing the quality of items received from all item pools. Quest items are unaffected.

name: Sanguine Bond
description: Spawns a special set of spikes in the Devil Room. Taking damage from the spikes has a chance to grant a reward.

name: The Swarm
description: Spawns eight orbital flies, which turn into Blue Flies after they block a shot. Each time a room is cleared, spawns another orbital fly.

name: Heartbreak
description: Grants 3 broken hearts and +0.25 damage for every broken heart Isaac has. Every otherwise fatal hit will add 2 more until Isaac has nothing but broken hearts.

name: Bloody Gust
description: The first 6 times Isaac takes damage on a given floor, he gains Speed and Fire Rate for the rest of the floor, up to a maximum of +1.02 and +3.00, respectively.

name: Salvation
description: Gives Isaac a halo that summons beams of light on enemies inside it. The halo grows larger the more times Isaac has taken damage this floor.

name: Vanishing Twin
description: Spawns a familiar that becomes a clone of the floor's boss when entering the Boss Room. Defeating it drops an extra item.

name: Twisted Pair
description: Spawns two familiars that float on either side of Isaac and fire tears that use his tears, range, shot speed, and tear effects, and scale with damage.

name: Azazel's Rage
description: Isaac builds rage every time a room is cleared. After four rooms, fires a large Brimstone laser when entering the next room.

name: Echo Chamber
quote: "I can see see the future future future"
description: When Isaac uses a Card, Pill, or Rune, he also uses a copy of the previous three Cards/Pills/Runes he used after picking up Echo Chamber.

name: Isaac's Tomb
description: Spawns an Old Chest at the start of each floor.

name: Vengeful Spirit
description: After taking damage, spawns an orbital wisp that lasts for the entire floor, up to a maximum of six. They fire tears but do not block shots.

name: Esau Jr.
description: Swaps between the current character and Esau Jr., who has +2 flat damage and flight. Characters have independent items and health. Dying as either character ends the run.

name: Berserk!
description: Causes Isaac to go berserk for 5 seconds, greatly increasing his speed, tears, and damage, but restricting him to using a melee weapon instead of his tears. This item charges by dealing damage to enemies instead of clearing rooms.

name: Dark Arts
description: Briefly grants +1 speed and makes Isaac invulnerable and intangible. When the effect ends, destroys all projectiles and damages all enemies Isaac ran through.

name: Abyss
description: Destroys all items in the room and gives Isaac a unique locust familiar for each item destroyed. Some items generate locusts with special effects.

name: Supper
description: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

name: Stapler
description: +1 Damage. Prevents Isaac from firing tears from his left eye, like Cain.

name: Suplex!
description: Isaac dashes forward and picks up the first enemy hit. After a moment, he slams them into the ground to deal damage and create a circular rock wave.

name: Bag of Crafting
description: Collects and holds up to 8 pickups, which can then be used to craft an item. The power level of the item is based on the quality of pickups used.

name: Flip
description: Item pedestals have a second uninteractable "ghostly" item behind them. Activating will flip the real and ghostly items around. If playing as Tainted Lazarus, also flips between them and Dead Tainted Lazarus.

name: Lemegeton
description: Spawns a wisp representing a random passive item, which orbits Isaac but can be destroyed. While the wisp is alive, Isaac gains that item's effects. Generation uses the current room's item pool 25% of the time, otherwise a random pool.

name: Sumptorium
description: Removes half a heart and creates a Clot familiar that mimics Isaac's movements and tear effects. As Tainted Eve, passively converts health into Clots while firing. Activating returns all Clots to health.

name: Recall
description: Retrieves the Forgotten's body from any distance. Only available as the Birthright effect for Tainted Forgotten.

name: Hold
description: Exclusive to Tainted???. Allows him to save one poop bomb for later, allowing him to gather more over time.

name: Keeper's Sack
description: Gives range, speed, or damage when buying things from a shop. Also spawns three coins and a Key on pickup.

name: Keeper's Kin
description: Rocks and other Obstacles spawn blue spiders over time while in a room with enemies, and spawn two blue spiders when destroyed.

name: Keeper's Box
description: Spawns a random shop item or pickup which can be bought for its normal price.

name: Everything Jar
description: Spawns certain pickups based on how many charges it has. If fully charged, instead has one of many unique effects.

name: TMTRAINER
description: Causes all future items to be "glitched", granting them completely random effects.

name: Anima Sola
description: Chains down the nearest enemy for 5 seconds, preventing them from acting.

name: Spindown Dice
description: Transforms all items in the room by decreasing their internal ID number.

name: Hypercoagulation
description: After Isaac takes damage from an enemy or donates health, launches Red Hearts from Isaac that despawn after 1.5 seconds.

name: IBS
description: Causes Isaac to throw poop, create buffing creep, or drop bombs while fighting enemies.

name: Hemoptysis
description: Double-tapping a fire button causes Isaac to sneeze blood, dealing damage to enemies in front of him. Affected enemies are cursed and take more damage from Brimstone-like attacks.

name: Ghost Bombs
description: +5 Bombs. Bombs become spectral and spawn ghosts that deal contact damage to enemies and explode after 10 seconds.

name: Gello
description: Spawns a demon familiar that's attached to Isaac and moves and fires in the direction Isaac shoots, using Isaac's damage, tears, range, shot speed, and special tear effects.

name: Decap Attack
description: Throws Isaac's head, which is still able to fire tears at the spot it lands. Reactivating the item or stepping on the head reattaches it.

name: Glass Eye
description: +0.75 damage, +1 luck.

name: Stye
description: Tears fired from Isaac's right eye have +28% Damage, +6.5 Range, and -0.3 Shot Speed.

name: Mom's Ring
description: +1 Damage. Drops a random Rune or Soul Stone upon pickup.
